title: 309. Q&AF: Raising Your Team's Standards, Never Being Satisfied & Quality Vs. Quantity
itunes:title: 309. Q&AF: Raising Your Team's Standards, Never Being Satisfied & Quality Vs. Quantity
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to get your team to operate at the same standards as you, when do you know you've done enough work for the day, and if you should place your focus on the quality of your product or the quantity to meet the demands.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on how to get your team to operate at the same standards as you, when do you know you've done enough work for the day, and if you should place your focus on the quality of your product or the quantity to meet the demands.
